message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $180. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
